wrong_login_details_message: The credentials you provided do not match our records.
no_login_challenge: Initiating a login into the App is currently not supported. Only external authentication is possible.
forgot_password_helptext: Forgot your password? No problem. Just let us know your email address and we will email you a password reset link that will allow you to choose a new one.
verify_helptext:
Thanks for signing up! Before getting started, could you verify your email address by clicking on the
                link we just emailed to you? If you didn't receive the email, we will gladly send you another.
verify_text_sent_to_your_mail: A new verification link has been sent to the email address you provided during registration. Please note that accounts that are not verified within 24 hours will be deleted.
name: Name
password_requirements_title: Your password must meet the following requirements
password_requirement_2: Must contain atleast a lowercase and uppercase letter
cookie_notice: We only use functional cookies that are required for the website to function.
profile_username_notice: This is NOT your badge name. Changes will be possible at a later point.
profile_avatar_notice: This is NOT your badge avatar.
groups_page_staff_notice: If you are part of Eurofurence Staff, please ask your director for an invite.
staff_members_can_see_departments: As a staff member you are able to view the following departments.
developers_note: You can code? Get in touch!
too_many_attempts_email_verification: You can resend the verification email every 30 seconds.
